showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“Damn, man. Just a little bit more
an' I woudda smashed him…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Barret}
“Looks like the Lifestream's
settled down now too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Red XIII}
“Just a little more and I
would have beaten him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Red XIII}
“It looks like the Lifestream
has settled as well.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // {Red XIII}
“But what about
{Tifa} and {Cloud}!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Cid}
“Damn!!
That &%$^%$ Weapon!!”{PAUSE}“Of all the times to show up!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cid}
“You &^$#&$# !
You tryin' to escape?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Cid}
“Th, this's bad!
The main stream is kickin' up!!”{PAUSE}“Somethin' way bigger than that
last one is on its way!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Cid}
“No good!!
Get outta here!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // {Cid}
“Goddammit!!”{PAUSE}“Don't have time to worry about anyone
other than yourself!
Don't know when that stream'll blow…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Yuffie}
“I swear, next time,
that guy's dead meat!”

back to normal.”

“No matter how many lives I get,
it ain't enough!”

control, too.”

“But what about
{Cloud} and the others?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Vincent}

Looks like escape is its best skill.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Vincent}
“And the Lifestream
also appears to be normal.”

{Cid}
“Damn!!
That &%$^%$ Weapon!!”{PAUSE}“Of all the times to show up!”

“Damn!!
That &%$^%$ Weapon!!”{PAUSE}“Of all the times to show up!”

{Cid}

You &$^%$!”

{Cid}
“You &^$#&$# !
You tryin' to escape?”

{Barret}
“Damn, man. Just a little bit more
an' I woudda smashed him…”

{Barret}
“Looks like the Lifestream's
settled down now too.”

{Red XIII}
“Just a little more and I
would have beaten him.”

{Red XIII}
“It looks like the Lifestream
has settled as well.”

“No matter how many lives I get,
it ain't enough!”

{Cait Sith}
“Looks like the Lifestream's back under
control, too.”

that guy's dead meat!”

“Well at least the Lifestream's
back to normal.”

{Vincent}
“Hmm…
Looks like escape is its best skill.”

{Vincent}
“And the Lifestream
also appears to be normal.”

{Cid}
“Damn, you gotta be kiddin'!!”

“Th, this's bad!

last one is on its way!!”

other than yourself!
